definition: adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack
handsome/refined/elegant/graceful/superior/show (loanword)/CL:場|场[chang2]/(literary) to grow/to bloom/(of crops) to produce ears

sentences.english: A major highlight of the ceremony is a unique paper-cut fashion show.
sentences.chinese: 頒獎典禮上一大亮點就是獨特的剪紙時裝秀。

sentences.english: In Milan his spectacular shows immediately become the must-see appointment during the men's fashion week.
sentences.chinese: 現在，他的時裝秀成爲男裝時裝週中不可錯過的品牌。

sentences.english: In addition, a major highlight of the ceremony is a unique paper-cut fashion show.
sentences.chinese: 另外，在頒獎典禮上一大亮點就是獨特的剪紙時裝秀。

sentences.english: Deepa wears one of her designs at the Jhoole fashion show.
sentences.chinese: 時裝秀穿她的一件設計衣服。

sentences.english: She has done it all, from Vogue covers to big-name fashion shows.
sentences.chinese: 從《時尚》封面到大牌時裝秀，她都做到了。

sentences.english: Sometimes, I may try to be more refined if I am going to fashion shows.
sentences.chinese: 如果要去參加時裝秀，我會再多花些心思在着裝上。

sentences.english: A full-figure fashion show in New York.
sentences.chinese: 一場肥胖人的時裝秀在紐約上演。

sentences.english: Nowadays, Qipao quite often appears on world-classfashionshows.
sentences.chinese: 如今，旗袍經常出現在世界級的時裝秀上。

sentences.english: I don't believe in religion, or in another human being wanting to govern over someone else. The themes that go through my shows will continue to.
sentences.chinese: 多年來貫穿在我的時裝秀上的主題將會繼續延續下去。

sentences.english: Don't let casual Fridays be your fashion downfall.
sentences.chinese: 不要讓星期五的便裝日成了你的時裝秀。

sentences.english: A behind-the-scenes look at the Spring 2010 fashion shows in Milan.
sentences.chinese: 2010年米蘭春季時裝秀的後臺一瞥。

sentences.english: Don't let casual Fridays be yourfashion downfall.
sentences.chinese: 不要讓星期五的便裝日成了你的時裝秀。

sentences.english: It's also incredibly funny. And there's an all-color fashion show mid-way through.
sentences.chinese: 另外，它也巨搞笑，劇中還穿插有一次全綵時裝秀。

sentences.english: In world fashion, another round of catwalk shows has begun with Paris.
sentences.chinese: 在全球時尚界，又一輪時裝秀正在巴黎上演。

definition: Brooklyn, borough of New York City
